title: Linda Mtoba welcomes her baby girl
text:
Linda Mtoba welcomes her baby girl share this

Cape Town - Ever since she made her stunning pregnancy announcement on social media, actress Linda Mtoba has been giving her followers the content they signed up for.

From stunning island baecations to her everyday "bumpfit" videos on Instagram showing off her outfit for the day, she had a post for every occasion. And even though we all enjoyed her pregnancy because she was glowing and looked so happy, we couldn’t wait for the arrival of Baby Bean, as she nicknamed her little unborn baby.

READ MORE: Linda Mtoba announces pregnancy

And on 3 October it finally happened: the 27-year-old The River actress gave birth to a healthy baby girl.

She shared the news on Instagram, of course, posting a cute black and white picture of her and her husband holding a tiny hand. It was captioned, "03|10|19."

While Linda misses her belly, she and her husband are in love with their little bundle of joy. “My husband & I look at our baby in such awe, like we made that,” she tweeted.
